MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Ashcroft Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.43am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required on site due to an underground cable fault on Ashcroft Drive and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.36am on Monday 7th December 2020.
